summary: The interface is used for consult pay view
description: The interface is used for consult pay view. Will return pay view info including balance, coupon, credit card etc. If we have no available coupon, we will return pay method view with an empty list of coupon.

query.name: payFrom
query.description: Where is the money to be received, the receivable details, including the user and payment amount information

query.name: payTos
query.description: Details payable, including sellers and amount

query.name: payOptions
query.description: pay simulate when payOptions is not null

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/lazadapay/v1/debit/consult_payment')
request.add_api_parameter("serviceCode", "01")
request.add_api_parameter("payFrom", "{\"transAmount\":{\"currency\":\"IDR\",\"value\":\"100\"},\"additionalInfo\":\"{}\",\"custIdMercghost\":\"{}\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("payTos", "[{\"customerId\":\"{}\",\"additionalInfo\":\"{}\",\"payToAmount\":{\"currency\":\"IDR\",\"value\":\"100\"}}]")
request.add_api_parameter("orderGroup", "{}")
request.add_api_parameter("envInfo", "{}")
request.add_api_parameter("payOptions", "{}")
request.add_api_parameter("productExt", "{}")
request.add_api_parameter("additionalInfo", "{}")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/lazadapay/v1/debit/consult_payment')
request.add_api_param('serviceCode', '01')
request.add_api_param('payFrom', '{\"transAmount\":{\"currency\":\"IDR\",\"value\":\"100\"},\"additionalInfo\":\"{}\",\"custIdMercghost\":\"{}\"}')
request.add_api_param('payTos', '[{\"customerId\":\"{}\",\"additionalInfo\":\"{}\",\"payToAmount\":{\"currency\":\"IDR\",\"value\":\"100\"}}]')
request.add_api_param('orderGroup', '{}')
request.add_api_param('envInfo', '{}')
request.add_api_param('payOptions', '{}')
request.add_api_param('productExt', '{}')
request.add_api_param('additionalInfo', '{}')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
